name: Angry animals attack gorillas
description:
Did you know the bird getting angry? Now you can see all the others animal getting angry too. The gorillas have just moved and they are not friendly neighbor. They begin to bully other animals and these guys aren't someone you want to mess with.
Let's see all the others animal getting angry too with "Angry animals attack gorillas" and join the battle to defeat the stubborn gorillas!!!

Main Features :
- With 60+ levels to play
- 8+ types of gorillas
- 9+ types of animals
- Simple control, easy to play
- Nice graphic and funny gameplay

**This application is optimized for IPhone 6(Plus), iPhone 6s (Plus), iPhone 7 (Plus), iPhone 8 (Plus), iPhone SE, iPhone X, iPhone Xs, Xr, iPhone Xs Max and all iPad devices.
